abstract: The company reported a 21 percent decline in net income for the second quarter.
snippet: The company reported a 21 percent decline in net income for the second quarter.
lead_paragraph: The recession is having two effects on Verizon Communications business. Businesses are cutting back sharply, and laid-off people no longer need corporate cellphones and laptop data cards.

headline.main: As Profit Falls 21%, Verizon Plans to Slash 8,000 Jobs
headline.print_headline: As Profit Falls 21%, Verizon Plans to Slash 8,000 Jobs
